title: The Funny Marco Interview: Dating Studs, Tormenting Walmart Customers & More
description:
Adam and Funny Marco have one the most hilarious convo ever! 

------
00:00 Intro
0:33 Marco explains why he feels like he's the Donkey in Shrek
1:30 Marco doesn't know who Safari is
3:30 Marco doesn't know why it's called No Jumper
4:23 Funny Marco hates his name now
6:23 Marco interviews Adam now
7:23 Fired from Popeye's and Wallmart
8:01 M**bated at Popeye and not washing your hands
8:59 Marco says m***bating takes away from having s*x, and says Adam is lying about not being selfish during s*x
11:10 Ad: Brand My Dispo
15:48 Adam's not sure if Marco j* off to gang bang p**n or gang bangers 
16:13 Working on a acne documentary, expects 6M for it when he wants to sell
17:17 At some point it was cliche to take a photo with Adam
18:38 Marco says some of Adam's interview are dry
21:18 Kanye tweets were allegedly fake 
25:50 Heavy on Twitch is his happy place
27:30 Interviewed Tech 9ine and Sleazy from Kansas
29:05 How do you know it's your kid for real?
33:20 "Keef Chief"??? 
35:52 Marco calls Gina "handsome"
36:23 Marco dates a gay woman sometimes
38:25 Ideal brand deal would be Skittles
40:04 Not smokig weed or anything strong + Long pause
41:39 Adam says he was influenced by Future when he was a 31year old kid, Marco says that's your decision, you shouldn't be influenced
43:39 Oprah is the richest interviewer
44:55 Let's get this interview over with!
46:19 Are you addicted to p***y? Adam explains when he realized he was 
47:28 Homeless at 17 getting laid round the clock
48:11 Jidion pranking Heather + Charlamagne's T-Rell Donkey of the Day 
51:41 Adam thinks he will still be doing podcast in 3 years
53:55 Adam wishes Marco to be so successful that he forgets about this interview
55:42 Adam watches k****ing videos at breakfast 
56:50 Marco got his first iced out watch + Jewelry detector 
57:25 Adam won't even attempt to get icy, thinks about an ankle bracelet tho
1:00:24 Trey Songz DMing Lena, Adam is not trying to fight Trey Songz
1:04:30 Marco doesn't poop
1:05:55 The Quando Rando situation 
1:07:14 Is this the end of the pod?
1:08:00 Is Adam looking for a surrogate?
1:08:35 Marco reminds Adam to wrap it up

-----
